backend/main.mo: Actor implementing session, output, and layer management with CRUD operations and session start/stop logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old session data to the new format with video source and layers fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router and defines routes for sessions list and session details.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header navigation, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LayersPanel.tsx: UI panel for viewing and adding ordered visual layers for a session using queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/OutputsList.tsx: Displays streaming outputs for a session with copy actions, error/loading states, and stream key notice.
frontend/src/components/PlatformTargetFo: Form component for selecting a streaming platform, validating platform-specific fields, and creating an output target for a session.
frontend/src/components/QuickStartDialog: Multi-step dialog for quickly creating a session, configuring a video source, and adding an output target.
frontend/src/components/SessionForm.tsx: Simple form for creating a new session with a title using react-hook-form and session creation mutation.
Alert component warning users about storing stream keys and suggesting stronger security for production.
frontend/src/components/VideoSourcePanel: Panel for viewing and updating a session's video source URL with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/features/sessions/api.ts: Wrapper functions around backend actor methods for sessions, outputs, layers, and video source operations.
frontend/src/features/sessions/mutations: React Query mutations for session operations like create, start, stop, add output, and set video source with toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/sessions/queries.t: React Query hooks for fetching sessions, outputs, and layers individually or in batches through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, and clearing identities. Wraps AuthClient setup with configurable options and exposes login state helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes. Applies global background, foreground, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider. Imports global styles and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/SessionDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a specific streaming session, allowing start/stop actions, configuration management, and error/loading states. Integrates multiple panels for outputs, video source, and layers.
frontend/src/pages/SessionsPage.tsx: Lists active streaming sessions with loading/error handling and provides dialogs for quick start and creating new sessions. Enables navigation to individual session pages.
frontend/src/platforms/registry.ts: Maintains a registry of platform adapters, preloading the YouTube adapter. Provides lookup and enumeration of registered platforms.
frontend/src/platforms/types.ts: Defines types for platform adapters, including field definitions and validation result structures. Specifies metadata needed to configure streaming targets.
frontend/src/platforms/validation.ts: Validates platform adapter field values, checking required fields, URL validity, and number constraints. Returns a keyed map of validation errors.
frontend/src/platforms/youtubeAdapter.ts: Defines the YouTube platform adapter with RTMP fields such as ingest URL, stream key, and bitrate. Provides default metadata and field configurations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins. Sets container rules, font families, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, including goals for multistreaming, platform adapters, YouTube integration, media sources, and overlay composition, plus a list of existing implemented features. Serves as the authoritative record for architectural notes, versions, and requirements.
